original: intros. intros cont_f cont_g. unfold continuity_2d_pt in *. intros eps. specialize (cont_f eps). specialize (cont_g eps). destruct cont_f as [delta_f Hf]. destruct cont_g as [delta_g Hg]. exists (Rmin delta_f delta_g). intros u v H1 H2. rewrite Rabs_minus_sym. apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rabs (f u v - f x y) + Rabs (g u v - g x y)). - apply Rabs_triang. - apply Rplus_lt_compat. + apply Hf. * apply Rlt_le_trans with (Rmin delta_f delta_g). ++ apply H1. ++ apply Rmin_l. * apply Rlt_le_trans with (Rmin delta_f delta_g). ++ apply H2. ++ apply Rmin_l. + apply Hg. * apply Rlt_le_trans with (Rmin delta_f delta_g). ++ apply H1. ++ apply Rmin_r. * apply Rlt_le_trans with (Rmin delta_f delta_g). ++ apply H2. ++ apply Rmin_r.
